name: Char7
body:
### Welcome to Char7.
This program has been made for helping people replace some [ASCII](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ASCII) code to [HTML](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTML) codes.

### The Main Purpose
It already have made in PHP, but it was one of the first codes that I made, then now, I would like to create something best, creating a backups, can restore those backups and custom the map of things that I can change.
Then I have written the new Char7 (or c7) using GO lang. 

### Authors and Contributors
The owner and programer of Char7 is Rodrigo Lopes (@rodkranz), start programming when he was going to Amsterdam to ReactNL conference on 11 October.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Char7? Check out our [documentation](https://github.com/rodkranz/char7/blob/master/README.md) or [issues](https://github.com/rodkranz/char7/issues) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
